EmailTemplate.description: To send legal case owner when case is created
EmailTemplate.name: Assigned Legal Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Your legal request was received for Account: {!Case.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.CreatedBy},
We received your case request for {!Account.Name}
Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName}
We will contact you if we have any questions.
To view {!Case.CaseNumber}, please click here
Note that you must be logged into salesforce.com before clicking the link.
Thank you,
FMS Law Department
